description:
Zesskia, the empire that now controls all nations within the continent of Eastald, is ruled by http://anidb.net/ch103862 [Emperor Harol] but his power is split between him, a http://anidb.net/ch103860 [Prime Minister], and five Dukes. Three of the Dukes have been killed for treason against the emperor. Its capital is Rondacia. It`s flag is a crescent red crescent moon inside a golden sun on a flag whose top half is blue, bottom half is red, and has a thinner white stripe down the middle.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Touitsu Zesskia
